content: lion brand pattern # bk4k-0506003-c *cff-catnipmouse pdf* no longer available published in by kids for kids skill level beginner 320-195 fun fur yarn hot pink 1 ball crochet hook - size f-5 3 75 mm scrap yarn for tail about 24 inches approximately 70 cm scrap yarn for eyes about 4 inches 10 cm black and white sewing needle and matching thread 1 package dried catnip see assembly diagrams showing how to fold the cone and finish catnip replaces stuffing in pocket pet pattern long tail mouse pocket pet bk4k-0506006-c 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pocket-pet-mouse-crochet
